fortune_1.message: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.

fortune_2.message: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

fortune_3.message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

fortune_4.message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

fortune_5.message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

fortune_6.message: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

fortune_7.message: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

fortune_8.message: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

fortune_9.message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

fortune_10.message: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

fortune_11.message: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.

fortune_12.message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

fortune_13.message: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

fortune_14.message: Your potential is endless. Go do what you were created to do.

fortune_15.message: Stars can't shine without darkness. Your struggles make you stronger.

fortune_16.message: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

fortune_18.message: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.

fortune_19.message: Dream big. Start small. Act now.

fortune_20.message: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.

fortune_21.message: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.

fortune_22.message: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.

fortune_23.message: Small daily improvements lead to stunning results.

fortune_25.message: The comeback is always stronger than the setback.

fortune_26.message: You will find happiness with a new love... probably your cat.

fortune_27.message: A closed mouth gathers no foot.

fortune_28.message: You will be hungry again in one hour.

fortune_29.message: Help! I'm being held prisoner in a fortune cookie factory!

fortune_30.message: The early bird might get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.

fortune_33.message: You will receive a fortune cookie.

fortune_35.message: You are reading a fortune cookie.

fortune_36.message: Your future is as bright as your past is dark... which isn't saying much.

fortune_37.message: You will soon be hungry again. Order more Chinese food.

fortune_38.message: A wise man once said nothing. He was probably eating.

fortune_39.message: Your lucky numbers are: All of them. You'll need the luck.

fortune_40.message: Today you will make progress... toward your refrigerator.

fortune_41.message: The answer you seek is in another cookie.

fortune_42.message: Your socks will bring you great fortune... if you wear them.

fortune_43.message: You will soon meet a tall, dark stranger... in the mirror.

fortune_46.message: You will find what you're looking for in the last place you look. Obviously.

fortune_47.message: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step... and comfortable shoes.

fortune_48.message: Your pet goldfish is plotting against you.

fortune_50.message: You have just wasted time reading this fortune.

fortune_51.message: Love is the bridge between two hearts.

fortune_52.message: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul.

fortune_53.message: True love stories never have endings.

fortune_54.message: Love is not about finding the right person, but being the right person.

fortune_55.message: In the arithmetic of love, one plus one equals everything.

fortune_57.message: The heart wants what it wants.

fortune_58.message: Love is friendship set on fire.

fortune_59.message: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.

fortune_60.message: Where there is love, there is life.

fortune_61.message: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.

fortune_62.message: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.

fortune_63.message: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.

fortune_64.message: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.

fortune_65.message: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden.

fortune_66.message: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.

fortune_67.message: Romance is thinking about your significant other when you should be thinking about something else.

fortune_68.message: A true love affair never ends.

fortune_69.message: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

fortune_70.message: You will soon find the love that has been seeking you.

fortune_71.message: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.

fortune_72.message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

fortune_73.message: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

fortune_74.message: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

fortune_76.message: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

fortune_77.message: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

fortune_78.message: Great things never come from comfort zones.

fortune_79.message: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.

fortune_80.message: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

fortune_81.message: Your career is about to take an unexpected and exciting turn.

fortune_82.message: A promotion or new opportunity is on the horizon.

fortune_83.message: Your hard work will soon pay off in ways you never expected.

fortune_84.message: The successful warrior is the average person with laser-like focus.

fortune_85.message: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

fortune_86.message: Your talent combined with hard work will open doors.

fortune_87.message: Winners are not people who never fail, but people who never quit.

fortune_88.message: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

fortune_89.message: Your next chapter is going to be amazing.

fortune_90.message: Every expert was once a beginner. Keep learning.

fortune_91.message: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

fortune_92.message: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.

fortune_93.message: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.

fortune_94.message: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

fortune_95.message: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

fortune_96.message: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

fortune_97.message: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

fortune_98.message: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

fortune_99.message: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

fortune_100.message: The unexamined life is not worth living.

fortune_101.message: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.

fortune_102.message: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.

fortune_103.message: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.

fortune_104.message: A wise person learns more from their enemies than a fool from their friends.

fortune_105.message: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

fortune_106.message: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.

fortune_107.message: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.

fortune_108.message: The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.

fortune_109.message: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.

fortune_110.message: Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.

fortune_111.message: A true friend is one soul in two bodies.

fortune_112.message: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another: 'What! You too?'

fortune_113.message: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.

fortune_114.message: Good friends are like stars. You don't always see them, but you know they're always there.

fortune_115.message: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.

fortune_116.message: A sweet friendship refreshes the soul.

fortune_117.message: Friends are the family you choose.

fortune_118.message: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.

fortune_119.message: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.

fortune_120.message: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.

fortune_121.message: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.

fortune_122.message: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.

fortune_123.message: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.

fortune_124.message: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends.

fortune_125.message: New friends await you in unexpected places. Stay open.

fortune_126.message: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.

fortune_127.message: Be slow to fall into friendship, but when you are in, continue firm and constant.

fortune_128.message: Friendship is the golden thread that ties the heart of all the world.

fortune_129.message: True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.

fortune_130.message: A day spent with friends is a day well spent.

fortune_131.message: This year, your birthday wishes will come true in unexpected ways.

fortune_132.message: A new age brings new adventures and wonderful surprises.

fortune_133.message: May your birthday mark the beginning of a wonderful period of time.

fortune_134.message: The coming year holds the keys to many doors of opportunity.

fortune_135.message: Age is merely the number of years the world has been enjoying you.

fortune_136.message: Your next year will be filled with laughter, love, and prosperity.

fortune_137.message: Every candle on your cake is a wish waiting to come true.

fortune_138.message: The best is yet to come. Happy birthday!

fortune_139.message: May this birthday bring you closer to all your dreams.

fortune_140.message: A birthday is not just a year older, but a year wiser.

fortune_141.message: Your birthday is nature's way of telling you to celebrate yourself.

fortune_142.message: This birthday begins a new chapter. Make it a bestseller.

fortune_143.message: Count your life by smiles, not tears. Count your age by friends, not years.

fortune_144.message: May your special day be the beginning of an extraordinary year.

fortune_145.message: Birthdays are a new start, a fresh beginning, and a time to pursue dreams.

fortune_146.message: Your birthday is the first day of another 365-day journey around the sun.

fortune_147.message: With age comes wisdom, and with wisdom comes great happiness.

fortune_148.message: Growing older is mandatory, but growing up is optional. Stay young at heart.

fortune_149.message: May today be the start of a wonderful, glorious, and joyful year!

fortune_150.message: Another year of life is another chance to achieve your dreams.

fortune_151.message: The more you study, the more you know. The more you know, the more you grow.

fortune_152.message: Success in exams comes to those who prepare with dedication.

fortune_153.message: Your next test will reveal the strength you didn't know you had.

fortune_154.message: Education is the passport to the future. Invest in it wisely.

fortune_155.message: The expert in anything was once a beginner. Keep studying.

fortune_156.message: Your brain is a muscle. The more you exercise it, the stronger it gets.

fortune_157.message: Every hour of studying is a step closer to your dreams.

fortune_158.message: The pain of studying is temporary. The pride of achievement is forever.

fortune_159.message: Good grades follow good study habits. Build yours today.

fortune_160.message: A mind that is stretched by new knowledge never returns to its old dimensions.

fortune_161.message: Your academic breakthrough is just around the corner. Keep pushing.

fortune_162.message: Study hard, for the well is deep, and our brains are shallow.

fortune_163.message: The only way to learn is to never stop studying.

fortune_164.message: Focus on your studies now, and your future self will thank you.

fortune_165.message: Knowledge is power. Empower yourself through education.

fortune_166.message: Your concentration and focus will lead to excellent exam results.

fortune_167.message: Learning is not a destination but a lifelong journey. Embrace it.

fortune_168.message: The seeds of knowledge you plant today will grow into forests of opportunity.

fortune_169.message: Stay curious, stay hungry for knowledge, and success will follow.

fortune_170.message: Your dedication to learning will open doors you never knew existed.

fortune_171.message: Good health is the greatest wealth you can possess.

fortune_172.message: A healthy outside starts from the inside.

fortune_173.message: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.

fortune_174.message: Your body hears everything your mind says. Stay positive.

fortune_175.message: A moment of relaxation is worth a lifetime of stress.

fortune_176.message: Adventure awaits those who dare to explore.

fortune_177.message: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page.

fortune_178.message: Your next journey will bring wisdom and joy.

fortune_179.message: Pack your bags. Destiny is calling you to new horizons.

fortune_180.message: Travel far, travel wide, and discover who you truly are.
